urls.title: How does the Fare Family work?
urls.description: How does the Fare Family work? Each passenger would have the option to choose the family brand that fits their travel needs as it consists of different attributes. The Fare Family benefits are as follows: Family Brand Lite Basic Flex (Except POS AU, NZ, TW and KR where refund is allowed with a fee) No flexibility to travel earlier on day of travel Changes to the Fare Family Structure of MH Shuttle for travels between KUL & SIN v.v. on MH Opera ting Direct Flights The new fare options for travel between

urls.title: Do I need a passport/visa to travel to any Malaysia Airlines destination?
urls.description: Do I need a passport/visa to travel to any Malaysia Airlines destination? Passport/Visa requirements for any destination depend on local regulations and vary according to the destinations you are travelling to as well as your nationality. Each passenger must hold a valid passport (and visa(s), if required) to be allowed entry into each destination on the flight itinerary. The airlines cannot be held responsible if a passenger is denied entry and/or deported by any local authorities. For further information
